column4: hi, guys.  i'm going to buy a laptop this weekend.  it'll be a 64 bit system with four gigs of ram.  i'm going to keep windows and dual boot.  will the 32 bit version of ubuntu recognize all four gig of ram or do i need 64 to do that?  and do flash and java work on 64 bit?
